attributes.action: Stop the Chagos Islands deal as it is not in the National Interest
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the UK need the government to explain how this will enhance Western security and improve relations with our most powerful ally USA 
This needs a full debate in parliament  together with an explantion of the financial implications to our economy and where the money is coming from.
attributes.background: Give the country a good reason as to how this is in the public interest and will enhance UK safety.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: 

Review decision to cede sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702712
